data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Northwest Territories who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northwest Territories, Canada
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Northwest Territories.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2,430 believers in the state of Northwest Territories the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Northwest Territories, Canada with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people. Make the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Northwest Territories, Canada.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Northwest Territories.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Northwest Territories, Canada find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
